unnormalised: Just a reminder for all business owners! Don't forget to link your PAN card (e.g., ABCDE1234F) with your Aadhaar (e.g., 1234 5678 9012) before the deadline to avoid penalties. Also, keep your GSTIN (e.g., 07AAACC1234B1Z0) handy for all transactions. Make sure your TAN (e.g., DELA12345A) is updated too. For companies, the CIN (e.g., U12345MH2000PLC123456) is super important for all filings with the MCA.
normalised: Just a reminder for all business owners! Don't forget to link your P-A-N card (e.g., A-B-C-D-E one two three four F) with your Aadhaar (e.g., one two three four five six seven eight nine zero one two) before the deadline to avoid penalties. Also, keep your G-S-T-I-N (e.g., zero seven A-A-A-C-C one two three four B one Z zero) handy for all transactions. Make sure your T-A-N (e.g., D-E-L-A one two three four five A) is updated too. For companies, the C-I-N (e.g., U one two three four five M-H two thousand P-L-C one two three four five six) is super important for all filings with the M-C-A.
